heading: Today
text: Dense fog through the river valleys burning off by mid-morning.  Sunny and pleasant.  Highs ranging from the low 70s to upper 70s north to south.  Light north winds, less than 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear and seasonably cool.  Areas of dense river valley fog.  Lows in the 40s to a few low 50s.  Winds light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: Locally dense fog through the river valleys burning off by mid-morning.  Sunny and a bit warmer.  Highs in the 70s, close to 80 in the warmer valleys.  Light winds.
